Welcome.About:
Hey! I‚Äôm Hermann Christian RAZAFINDRANAIVO ‚Äî a full-stack developer who took a detour through Telecommunications, graduated in 2020, and then quickly realized: I‚Äôd rather build on the web than debug radio signals üòÖ.  
 So I made the switch. I dove into web development, and never looked back.  
  
 For a while, I worked on local projects, building my skills and exploring tools that actually made coding fun ‚Äî like Next.js, TypeScript, Django, and Flask. But the real shift came in 2024, when I started working online and got into freelancing. That opened the door to remote work, diverse projects, and the kind of creative freedom I‚Äôd been looking for.  
  
 üí¨ My motto? *Plan before you code, structure before function, and clean, maintainable code above all.* Because a well-thought-out project saves time, headaches, and a whole lot of debugging rage later üòÖ. ‚Äî future-you will thank you.  
 
 üìå I often work freelance and remotely, and I‚Äôm always open to new challenges‚Äîespecially the kind that push my skills further. So if you‚Äôre looking for a developer who codes clean, thinks fast, and loves to build things that *just work*, you‚Äôre in the right place.
